originalText.text: I worked for Vanguard Staffing in Stamford, CT for a couple of years. As of October of 2020, they kept me constantly working at two assignments. The last assignment has turned into permanent employment for me. I highly recommend Vanguard Staffing if you are currently unemployed and looking for employment. They were a great bunch of people to work for and they also work for you. I highly recommend this agency to anyone needing work. Thanks Jaime, Keyla and Felicia just to name a few.

originalText.text: Unprofessional people that care about themselves not their enter level employees punishing and discriminating them, certian preference is seen and HR doesn’t nothing about this aspect.

originalText.text: My experience with Vanguard Staffing has been immeasurable. I can't begin to explain what it feels like to be able to plan other aspects of your life because you are working. Grateful seems like too small a word when you think about the magnitude of something like employment. I would highly recommend Vanguard Staffing to anyone.

originalText.text: My experience with Vanguard has been (and is) excellent! Vanguard has been the best staffing agency I have ever dealt with here in New York, after years of dealing with extremely flakey and pretentiously "faux-fancy" other agencies. Calvin and the rest of the team believed in me and my work from the beginning, and put me to work right away. Thank you! -A

text.text: My experience with Vanguard has been (and is) excellent! Vanguard has been the best staffing agency I have ever dealt with here in New York, after years of dealing with extremely flakey and pretentiously "faux-fancy" other agencies. Calvin and the rest of the team believed in me and my work from the beginning, and put me to work right away. Thank you! -A

originalText.text:
Jay and his recruiting team are amazing. My first week as a recruiting intern there i witnessed strong efforts being put forth so that a candidates expectations could be met for a role they were looking to fill. I was lucky to gain my recruiting internship at this staffing agency and I’ve gained knowledge that will be used down the line in my career. At my initial meeting with Jay he let me know he was flexible and he stood by that. My first day everything was set up for me to work.
This team makes sure that candidates are qualified for each and every role. No discrimination what so ever. Pay is every week and on time. There is an alert that is sent out to let you know how much your pay will be. New roles come in every week. I would highly recommend this staffing agency.
